Marksman Maddy:
Do you have some business with me?
I am Maddy, the Marksman who protects this place. Past here, all the way to the outskirts of the village, you'll find the area swarming with monsters. Unless you're prepared to protect yourself, I wouldn't advise venturing out there recklessly.
Ask about outside the village.
View information on the local lord and tax rate.
